stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 6 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and gain click click. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from this asset.
text:
When you rez this asset, load 6[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and gain [click][click].
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset.
title: Otto Campaign
